languages.text: Злобный энфорсер тут же контрагрументирует это тем, что на прошлой неделе работяги украли ящик тушенки, так что пусть расплачиваются теперь.
"Хватит скулить! Вы с дружками стащили ящик пищебрикетов несколько вахт назад, а до того — две канистры воды. Я не прибил вас только из жалости, и вот твоя благодарность?"

"Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"
languages.original_text: "Хватит скулить! Вы с дружками стащили ящик пищебрикетов несколько вахт назад, а до того — две канистры воды. Я не прибил вас только из жалости, и вот твоя благодарность?"

traits.locale_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals nicked a box of food bars a few watches ago, and before that, two canisters of water. I didn't rough you up out of pity only, and this is the thanks I get from you?"

"Enough whining! You and your pals nicked a box of food bars a few watches ago, and before that, two canisters of water. I didn't rough you up out of pity only, and this is the thanks I get from you?"

"Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of food bars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. You avoided a beating because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

"Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of food bars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. You avoided a beating because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

"Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

"Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

languages.text: «¡Basta de quejas! Tus amigos y tú robasteis una caja de barritas de nutrientes hace un puñado de guardias, y dos bidones de agua antes de eso. No os di una paliza de muerte porque disteis pena, ¿y así me lo agradeces?».
languages.original_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Basta de quejas! Tus amigos y tú robasteis una caja de barritas de nutrientes hace un puñado de guardias, y dos bidones de agua antes de eso. No os di una paliza de muerte porque disteis pena, ¿y así me lo agradeces?».

languages.text: 「泣き言はたくさんだ！お前とその仲間は、数ウォッチ前に栄養バーの箱を盗んだ。その前は水の缶2つだ。殴り倒つけなかったのは哀れに思ったからだというのに、これがそのお礼なのか？」
languages.original_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

traits.locale_text: 「泣き言はたくさんだ！お前とその仲間は、数ウォッチ前に栄養バーの箱を盗んだ。その前は水の缶2つだ。殴り倒つけなかったのは哀れに思ったからだというのに、これがそのお礼なのか？」

languages.text: “你还真能抱怨！就在几巡之前，你和你的朋友们偷走了一盒营养条，在这之前还偷过两罐水。我出于同情，没把你们活活打死，可到头来你就是这么感谢我的吗？”
languages.original_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

traits.locale_text: “你还真能抱怨！就在几巡之前，你和你的朋友们偷走了一盒营养条，在这之前还偷过两罐水。我出于同情，没把你们活活打死，可到头来你就是这么感谢我的吗？”

languages.text: "Genug gejammert! Ihr und Eure Kameraden habt vor einigen Wachschichten eine Kiste mit Nutririegeln gestohlen, und davor zwei Kanister Wasser. Ich habe Euch aus Mitleid nicht totgeschlagen, und das ist jetzt der Dank dafür?"
languages.original_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

traits.locale_text: "Genug gejammert! Ihr und Eure Kameraden habt vor einigen Wachschichten eine Kiste mit Nutririegeln gestohlen, und davor zwei Kanister Wasser. Ich habe Euch aus Mitleid nicht totgeschlagen, und das ist jetzt der Dank dafür?"

languages.text: « Assez pleurniché ! Tes petits camarades et toi avez volé une boîte de nutribarres il y a peu, et avant ça, deux bidons d'eau. J'ai retenu mes coups parce que tu me faisais pitié, et c'est comme ça que tu me remercies ? »
languages.original_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"

traits.locale_text: « Assez pleurniché ! Tes petits camarades et toi avez volé une boîte de nutribarres il y a peu, et avant ça, deux bidons d'eau. J'ai retenu mes coups parce que tu me faisais pitié, et c'est comme ça que tu me remercies ? »

languages.text: "Bu kadar mızmızlanman yeter! Birkaç vardiya öncesinde ahbaplarınla birlikte bir besinbar kutusu aşırdınız. Ondan önce de iki su kapsülü götürdünüz. Sırf sana acıdım diye seni eşek sudan gelene kadar dövmedim, bana böyle mi teşekkür ediyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Enough whining! You and your pals lifted a box of nutribars a few watches ago, and two canisters of water before that. I didn't beat the life out of you because I took pity on you, and this is the thanks I get?"
